title: Heterochorma in Zoe
body:
To whichever rioter decided this, I think it was a nice touch.  Good job.  

Just please don't do it again for another 100 champs because stuff like this should be rare.

replies.body: I like to look for things we haven't done (which after ~130 is not that much) yet and try them out. With her theme of juxtaposition it communicated something core to her as a character.

> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=BNfaq9jH,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-22T02:25:51.173+0000)
>
> I like to look for things we haven't done (which after ~130 is not that much) yet and try them out. With her theme of juxtaposition it communicated something core to her as a character.

Tell the team to look for an artist called hushabyevalley in Twitter or Tumblr, they have a lot of unique OC designs and concepts that league hasn't use. is one of my favourite artists out there, Give it a look and tell me what you think ;)

Well I'm glad you tried it out.  Yeah, I think it does piggyback with that theme.  SE also did something similar in FFX with Yuna's visual design and background.  She was of mixed decent and had a green eye from one parent and a blue eye from the other.
